content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you, James. I am glad to hear that you are interested in the apartment. Can you tell me what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay x Euros, but I am not sure what the market rate is in New York. Do you have any idea?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Well, the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in New York can vary depending on the location and other factors. However, as a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would expect a rental price that reflects the current market value. Would you be able to provide more information about your budget and what you are willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay up to 1000 Euros per month. But I would like to see the market rate first and get an idea of what is reasonable. Can you give me some information on the current market rate in New York?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, James. According to recent data, the average monthly rent for a 25 square meter apartment in New York is around 1200 Euros. However, this can vary greatly depending on the location and other factors. Would you be willing to pay a rental price that is slightly higher than the average market rate, say around 1300 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
